transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ji Utkarsh sir Monica baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Executive: Yes mam bataye.
Customer: Ji good evening sir kaise hain aap?
Executive: Badhiya mam.
Executive: Okay aur kaisa chal raha hai sir kaam abhi IndiaMART se?
Customer: Mam kaam to bahut down chal raha hai.
Executive: Kya issue aa raha hai sir?
Customer: Mam issue ye aa raha hai ki paper blocks ke lead bahut kam aa rahi hai aur jo aa rahi hai wo sab relevant hai.
Executive: Jo aa rahi hai wo sab relevant nahi hai?
Customer: Relevant nahi hai pehli baat to bahut kam aa rahi hai call flow bahut hi kharab aa raha hai aur relevant bhi nahi aa rahi hai matlab aap samajh lijiye wo kehte hain ki maine inquiry nahi kari aap log baar baar phone karte ho ye wo response aa raha hai.
Executive: Theek hai. Sir call flow ki agar main baat karu sabse pehle call flow pe aati hu theek hai to call flow is mahine mein abhi tak 60 call aa chuki hai.
Customer: Haan. Theek hai agar main yahi agar aap din ka bhi aap wo lagaoge to aap dekh lo call ka aur call kaisi hai aapko pata hai aaj kal IndiaMART pe advertisement ki call aa rahi hai mere paas.
Executive: Advertisement matlab kya aa raha hai usme?
Customer: Matlab kuch bhi aati hai matlab jo bol rahe the robotic speaker hota hai jaise AI calling hoti hai.
Executive: Aisi calls aa rahi hai?
Customer: Aisi calls bhi bahut sari aayi hai abhi.
Executive: To aise wale scenario mein na jab bhi call aaye aapko pata chal jaye aisa hai to hash one press kar diya karo sir aap.
Customer: Sir?
Executive: Hash one jaise main inse baat kar rahi hu na aap call aaye aapne attend kiya aapko pata chal gaya ki acha aisi fraud call aa rahi hai aap hash one waha pe press kar do aisi call aani band ho jayegi like us particular number se koi dobara aapko call nahi kar payega.
Customer: Are to usse hamare business pe kya matlab hame to call genuine chahiye na.
Executive: Haan haan bilkul sir dekho 100% calls correct aa pana matlab abhi tak humne calls mein koi filtration nahi lagaya by list mein zarur main kahungi ki ha wo verify ho rahi hai lekin calls verify kar pana possible nahi because overall India face pe ya fir main kahu to world wide aapka kahin na kahin aapki visibility dikhti hai abhi wo to directly aapke business pe call aa rahi hai ek buyer ne uthaya aur aapke number pe call laga diya aap mujhe batao sir usko rok pana hamare hath mein hai?
Customer: Mam aapke hath mein nahi hai kam se kam mam hamara ye SEO aap log run karte ho wo log to aapke website pe to hoga na to kam se kam aap ye dikha sakte ho na ki paper blocks wagera hamara matlab market hum log ka show kare leaders ye hai.
Executive: Nahi wo to show ho raha hai sir wo to industry leader prefer leader hamari services chal rahi hai to wo show ho raha hai isi wajah se to aapke paas aisi calls aa rahi hai na aap for example main ek email leti hu main fly ash brick making machine theek hai aapko pata hai agar main abhi dekhu to JKT tile machine bhi Noida wali dusre number pe dikh rahi hai.
Customer: Pehle pe kaun hai?
Executive: Sir wo Revomac hai Revomac industry.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Wo to refresh hoti rehti hai na jitne baar aap page refresh karoge aap sabse top pe chahe industry leader hai to chahe industry leader mein charo mein aapka naam shafal ho raha hai aisa fix to positioning hai nahi.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To wo top four mein hai to achi positioning hai aapki to jab teen mahine pehle tak itna achcha flow tha maine aapse jab baat bhi hui thi meri.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Customer: To mam aapne is maine khud bola tha ki mam aisa bhi kuch khas problem nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Ji ji ji.
Customer: Lekin aaj ke time pe main aapko bataunga teen mahine se mam aisa laga hai bilkul na ke barabar call na ke barabar matlab response matlab aap samajh rahe ho by list to mam aapko bata du mam mazak se hat ke panch panch ghante refresh karwa rahe hain bande ko filhal.
Executive: Achcha aur to easy refresh laga ke rakha hai aapne sab?
Customer: Kya auto?
Executive: Auto easy refresh?
Customer: Nahi ye kya hota hai?
Executive: Sir isse aapka page automatically refresh hota hai by list wala section.
Customer: Kaise lagega ye?
Executive: Sir video meeting kar sakte hain kya main google meet ki link bheju aapko?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Mujhe mail id bataye kaun si mail id pe link share karu sir?
Customer: Jktilemachinery1@gmail.com.
Executive: Ek second sir. Ye registered wahi wali mail id hai kya jo aapne bataya mujhe abhi?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Tab to udhar hi chala jayega dekhti hu.
Executive: Haan chala gaya sir jktilemachinery1@gmail.com open kariye ek bari.
Executive: Monica Raj ji.
Customer: Okay. Paanch minute mein aapko. Haan bilkul aapke paas mera number nahi hai kya?
Customer: Nahi mam number diya hi nahi aapne.
Executive: Please sir diya hai last time message kiya tha na maine.
Customer: Achcha. Sorry nahi aap please wo number please save kar lijiye kuch bhi dikkat pareshani ho aap directly mere ko connect kar sakte ho sir.
Customer: Theek hai mam.
Executive: Theek hai maine video meeting join kar liya hai aapka wait kar rahi hu sir aap join kariye theek hai.
Customer: Okay paanch minute mein kar raha hu number ek baar hi kar dijiyega please number se.
Executive: Ji ji main dobara message karti hu theek hai sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Facing very low buylead volume. 

- Receiving irrelevant buyleads.

- Receiving advertisement calls.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested pressing hash one for fraud calls.

- Executive shared the video meeting link on mail.

- Executive shared her contact number.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will join the video meeting.



Alert (If Any):

fraud

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, spam calls, video meeting
